item.dc:creator: @Mental_Piracy Mental Piracy
item.description:
@Mental_Piracy wrote:

Why not make it easy on yourself and make the “vent” add it, find where your object clicking is for the vents to get into pit. Then add your += 1 for playercount to that, Then when the game starts set it back to 0. Then when anyone dies in pits add back to counter and then add the winner. that way you dont have to screw around with areas.
